title: The Millionaire's Thief
description: Olivia Jones is a 29 year old who has pressed the reset button on her life twice so far. Her criminal past forced her to do so...She is now a regular gal going on a long awaited island gateaway with her best friend and her husband.  Jake Mathews is a multimillinaire who has no interest in romance but this petite brunette has caught his eye. He is not used to hearing the word NO.  Will the two of them crash and burn? Will Olivia's past or Jake's stubbornness win?
author: Myro Michaels
